i001 2025/02/05 :: hello world ðŸ‘‹ 
i002 2025/02/05 :: termux~ backup: tar -zcf /data/data/com.termux/files/home/storage/sdcard/termux-backup.tar.gz -C /data/data/com.termux/files ./home ./usr
i003 2025/02/07 :: termux~ restore: tar -zxf /data/data/com.termux/files/home/storage/sdcard/termux-backup.tar.gz -C /data/data/com.termux/files --recursive-unlink --preserve-permissions
i004 2025/02/05 :: shortcut: ln -s /storage/0000-709B sdcard
i005 2025/02/06 :: Python~ https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/index.html
i006 2025/02/06 :: Python~ https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ?si=BbyVruE6eEQwArvu
i007 2025/02/07 :: nano~ NrLini: Alt + #
i008 2025/02/07 :: nano~ ZawijanieTeksu: ESC + $
i008 2025/02/07 :: show nano~
